testcase.name: checkout function with mock Web shop
testcase.system-out: Given Open admin page of Anyday.............................................passed Then Enter username and password click Sign In..............................passed Then Navigate to left side and click on Merchants option....................passed Then Scroll horizontal till Details column and click on eyes icon...........passed Given Navigate to API tab and click regenerate API key button...............passed Given Copy API key with click on copy icon..................................passed Then Logout Anyday admin page and switch windows to mock webshop form.......passed Then Open mock webshop form past API key in Merchant API key text field.....passed Given Fill total price more then three hundred price........................passed Then Enter URL for navigate shopper page and click on submit button.........passed Given Navigate to shopper page and follow login steps.......................passed Given verify all the payments instalment and check box click on Pay First Instalment.passed
